__e: Even when you was a kid out in the desert, and all there was was the sand and the rock and the silence,
'Only rock and ice, like everything else we found up there.
Well, after the lieutenant brought me out of the building, he hid me behind some rocks, and then, when he came back, he...
We weren't able to build connecting dugouts.
We move rocks from there to there, and then back from there to there?
Some of these boulders were the size of Volkswagens and you don't want to land with one gear on top of one and one gear down in a hole.
